item.title: Shiny in Blogdown
item.description: How to embed Shiny My Shiny app example How to embed Shiny Since Blogdown is for static websites, it cannot run Shiny in rmarkdown directly. According to discussion here and document here. The only way to do it is using iframe and write outside the chunk: <iframe src="https://liuyanguu.shinyapps.io/bcl_app/" width=1000 height=800"></iframe> There is also a built-in function in knitr to do the same thing and write in the chunk.
